{-} The mission ends when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Standing at the cliff edge, you can see the facility down below. With a few guards lingering outside, the facility doesn't appear quite as abandoned as advertised. Investigating it might be more difficult than you anticipated, but it should still be manageable.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can interact with a terminal to try and either slice or force it to open a door.
{-} The mission progresses when the heroes find the lab.
{-} The mission ends when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Dozens of stormtroopers pour out of the supposedly abandoned facility, but you're long gone before anyone picks up your trail. You send a polite message to your contact, emphasizing precisely how not abandoned the facility actually was.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Rebel players choose one hero to receive the "Adrenal Implant" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You curse the name of whatever idiot gave the intelligence about this facility being abandoned. What seems like a legion of Imperial troops begins to respond to a deafening alarm.

Dozens run out of the facility in pursuit of you, far more motivated in the chase than you'd have expected.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Lightly Guarded
globalEvents.eventText: Dust covers the door in this room, empty save for a group of Imperial soldiers who quickly take cover and begin firing.

entityProperties.name: Command Room Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Command Room".

{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with a nearby terminal to open the door.

entityProperties.name: First Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText: The terminal hums softly. It controls the Command Room door.

globalEvents.name: Too Quiet
globalEvents.eventText:
A large receiving bay lies before you, clearly disused. Shelves of miscellaneous items are lined up throughout the area. Though the organization system is a bit lacking, at least everything is labeled.

{-} The neutral mission token represents the formula. A hero can retrieve the formula.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents an exit. A hero carrying the formula can escape through the exit.
{-} The Rebels win when a hero carrying the formula escapes.

entityProperties.name: Lab Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Laboratory".

The door is locked. A hero can interact with a nearby terminal to open the door.

entityProperties.name: Central Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText: The terminal hums softly. It controls the Laboratory door.

entityProperties.name: Exit
entityProperties.theText:
This is your way to escape.

A hero carrying the formular can escape through this space.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The neutral mission token represents the formula. A hero can retrieve the formula.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents an exit. A hero carrying the formula can escape through the exit.
{-} The Rebels win when a hero carrying the formula escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Sound the Alarms
globalEvents.eventText:
Flashing red light fills the hangar bay, while a blaring alarm sounds throughout the facility.
With the formula in hand, you turn toward the exit with thoughts of a hasty retreat. You manage to take two steps before the door snaps shut with a loud clang.

{-} Doors are locked. A hero can interact with a terminal to try and either slice or destroy it and open a door.

entityProperties.name: Command Room Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Command Room".

The door is locked. A hero can interact with a nearby terminal to open the door.

entityProperties.name: Lab Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Laboratory".

The door is locked. A hero can interact with a nearby terminal to open the door.

entityProperties.name: Lab Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The terminal hums softly. It appears to control the Laboratory door.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {K}) to open the Laboratory door.

entityProperties.name: Central Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The terminal hums softly. It appears to control both the Laboratory and the Command Room doors.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {K}) to open the Laboratory or the Command Room door.

entityProperties.name: First Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The terminal hums softly. It appears to control the Command Room door.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {K}) to open the Command Room door.

entityProperties.name: Formula
entityProperties.theText: The data chip with the formula is stored in a large shelf.
